AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: Sets the The value binding expression linking this component to a property in a backing bean

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Sets the The component identifier for this component. This value must be unique within the closest parent component that is a naming container.

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: Sets the Flag indicating whether or not this component should be rendered (during Render Response Phase), or processed on any subsequent form submit.

AttributeType.name: sortBy
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the field to sort on

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: Sets the The value binding expression linking this component to a property in a backing bean

AttributeType.name: bottomPagerEnabled
AttributeType.description: Sets the boolean indicating whether the bottom pager is enabled or not

AttributeType.name: columnFooterStyle
AttributeType.description: Sets the default Style applied to columns' footer

AttributeType.name: columnFooterStyleClass
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the css class applied to columns' footer

AttributeType.name: columnHeaderStyle
AttributeType.description: Sets the default Style applied to columns' header

AttributeType.name: columnHeaderStyleClass
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the css class applied to columns' header

AttributeType.name: columnStyle
AttributeType.description: Sets the default Style applied to columns

AttributeType.name: columnStyleClass
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the css class applied to columns

AttributeType.name: customPagingEnabled
AttributeType.description: Sets the flag indicating whether custom paging is enabled or not

AttributeType.name: customSortingEnabled
AttributeType.description: Sets the flag indicating whether custom sorting is enabled or not

AttributeType.name: dataKeyName
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the field(s) that uniquely identify each record in the data source (use semi-colons to specify a composite primary key).

AttributeType.name: dataSource
AttributeType.description: Sets the data source this component is bound to

AttributeType.name: footerStyle
AttributeType.description: Sets the default Style applied to the grid footer

AttributeType.name: footerStyleClass
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the css class applied to the grid footer

AttributeType.name: headerStyle
AttributeType.description: Sets the default Style applied to the grid header

AttributeType.name: headerStyleClass
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the css class applied to the grid header

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Sets the The component identifier for this component. This value must be unique within the closest parent component that is a naming container.

AttributeType.name: itemCount
AttributeType.description: Sets the total number of items contained in the underlying dataModel (used when customPagingEnabled is set to true)

AttributeType.name: pageChangeListener
AttributeType.description: Sets the MethodBinding representing a pageChangeListener method that is notified of PageChangeEvent

AttributeType.name: pageSize
AttributeType.description: Sets the number of items to display on each page (0 means all items).

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: Sets the Flag indicating whether or not this component should be rendered (during Render Response Phase), or processed on any subsequent form submit.

AttributeType.name: rowAlternateStyle
AttributeType.description: Sets the default Style applied to alternate rows

AttributeType.name: rowAlternateStyleClass
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the css class applied to alternate rows

AttributeType.name: rowStyle
AttributeType.description: Sets the default Style applied to rows

AttributeType.name: rowStyleClass
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the css class applied to rows

AttributeType.name: style
AttributeType.description: Sets the default Style applied to the menu

AttributeType.name: styleClass
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the css class applied to the menu

AttributeType.name: theme
AttributeType.description: Sets the preset look and feel applied to the component (Classic, None, OfficeXp, WinXp)

AttributeType.name: topPagerEnabled
AttributeType.description: Sets the boolean indicating whether the top pager is enabled or not

AttributeType.name: viewType
AttributeType.description: Sets the Specify how the list of items will be displayed to the user. Valid values (Grid, Thumbnail, Card)

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: Sets the The value binding expression linking this component to a property in a backing bean

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Sets the The component identifier for this component. This value must be unique within the closest parent component that is a naming container.

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: Sets the Flag indicating whether or not this component should be rendered (during Render Response Phase), or processed on any subsequent form submit.
